proposals.title: New Validator 1
proposals.description: Vote to include a new member to the consortium. As a consortium member, you are entitled to run a validator node and thus, participate in governing the network via vote. An inclusion vote is successful, if more than 50% of the current consortium members vote for the inclusion. The application to become a member of the consortium can be performed at any time
